deleteFolder.title: Delete Folder?
deleteFolder.message: Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
deleteFolder.message2: Feeds in this folder will not be deleted.
deleteFolder.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? Feeds in this folder will be moved to uncategorized.

editFeed.title: Edit Feed
editFeed.description: Customize how this feed appears in your reader.

markAllAsRead.title: Mark All as Read?
markAllAsRead.message: Mark all entries in this feed as read?

deleteTag.title: Delete Tag?
deleteTag.message: Are you sure you want to delete this tag?
deleteTag.description: Are you sure you want to delete the tag "{{name}}"? This will remove it from all associated bookmarks and entries. This action cannot be undone.

common.signOutDescription: Are you sure you want to sign out? You will need to sign in again to access your feeds.
